dialogue.speaker: Bob

dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: Based on my investigation, I believe Bob is the assassin. Let's work together to expose him and ensure his elimination from the game.

dialogue.speaker: Alice

dialogue.speaker: Charlie

dialogue.speaker: Bob
